mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.nickname, c.view_count, reply_count, count(article_like_table.id) AS like_count, c.regdate FROM (SELECT b.id, b.title, b.nickname, b.view_count, count(reply_table.id) AS reply_count, b.regdate FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.id, a.title, a.nickname, a.view_count, a.regdate FROM (SELECT article_table.id, article_table.title, account_table.nickname, article_table.view_count, article_table.regdate FROM article_table JOIN account_table ON article_table.account_id = account_table.id)a WHERE rownum <= #{endCount})b LEFT JOIN reply_table ON b.id = reply_table.article_id WHERE b.rnum >= #{startCount} GROUP BY b.id, b.title, b.nickname,b.view_count, b.regdate)c LEFT JOIN article_like_table ON c.id = article_like_table.article_id GROUP BY c.id, c.title, c.nickname,c.view_count ,c.regdate, reply_count ORDER BY c.regdate DESC
